name: LabelMapMaskImageFilter

members.name: Label
members.detaileddescriptionSet: The label to mask or to not mask, depending on the value of the Negated ivar.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: The label to mask or to not mask, depending on the value of the Negated ivar.

members.name: BackgroundValue
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the value used as "background" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::ZeroValue() .
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the value used as "background" in the output image. Defaults to NumericTraits<PixelType>::ZeroValue() .

members.name: Negated
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get whether the Label should be masked or not.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get whether the Label should be masked or not.

members.name: Crop
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get whether the image size should be adjusted to the masked image or not.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get whether the image size should be adjusted to the masked image or not.

members.name: CropBorder
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Set/Get the boder added to the mask before the crop. The default is 0 on all the axes.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Set/Get the boder added to the mask before the crop. The default is 0 on all the axes.

tests.description: Running with just setting correct label

briefdescription: Mask and image with a LabelMap .
detaileddescription:
LabelMapMaskImageFilter mask the content of an input image according to the content of the input LabelMap . The masked pixel of the input image are set to the BackgroundValue. LabelMapMaskImageFilter can keep the input image for one label only, with Negated = false (the default) or it can mask the input image for a single label, when Negated equals true. In Both cases, the label is set with SetLabel() .

\author Gaetan Lehmann. Biologie du Developpement et de la Reproduction, INRA de Jouy-en-Josas, France.

This implementation was taken from the Insight Journal paper: https://hdl.handle.net/1926/584 or http://www.insight-journal.org/browse/publication/176 

\see LabelMapToBinaryImageFilter , LabelMapToLabelImageFilter
